features.name: Authentication
features.description: Standard Laravel authentication scaffolding (Breeze) with Inertia + React UI; user registration, login, password reset, profile update.

features.name: Brand Management
features.description: CRUD for Brands. Brands have managers and team users via pivot tables (brand_managers, brand_users). Managers can create brands and assign managers. Stores extra metadata like audience and started_on.

features.name: User Management / Team Members
features.description: Admin and Manager flows to create users. Managers can create team members and assign them to one or more brands via brand_users pivot. Role assignment via Spatie package.

features.name: Tasks
features.description: Task CRUD with assignment to brands and users. Task visibility is filtered so TeamUser sees tasks for their assigned brands and assigned tasks. Task comments and dependency relations exist.

features.name: Dashboard Metrics
features.description: Service to aggregate recent activity across tasks and brands shown on the dashboard.
